name: Three variations on the theme of revolution
description:
This is a collection of small, editioned pieces. 

You get:
*a screenprinted box
*three inkjet prints mounted on wood for easy hanging
*a mobile
*an optical toy
*a top

This project is a play on the word "revolution," set up here to connote ideas of political upheaval, but really about the idea of spinning or turning around, over and over. It's in an edition of 50, and each one involves a lot of handworking. This makes a great present! It's like a mini art collection in a box.
